properties.entry: SELECT DISTINCT(department.department_id), department_name FROM lmldb.department, lmldb.reserve_list, lmldb.reserve_list_courses WHERE department.department_id != 22 AND reserve_list.reserve_list_id = reserve_list_courses.reserve_list_id AND department.department_id = reserve_list_courses.department_id AND expire_date > SYSDATE ORDER BY department_name

SELECT distinct(bib_item.bib_id), title_brief, course_number FROM lmldb.reserve_list_items, lmldb.reserve_list, lmldb.reserve_list_courses, lmldb.department, lmldb.course, lmldb.bib_item, lmldb.bib_text WHERE reserve_list.reserve_list_id = reserve_list_items.reserve_list_id AND reserve_list.reserve_list_id = reserve_list_courses.reserve_list_id AND department.department_id = reserve_list_courses.department_id AND course.course_id = reserve_list_courses.course_id AND bib_item.item_id = reserve_list_items.item_id AND bib_text.bib_id = bib_item.bib_id AND bib_item.bib_id NOT IN ( SELECT bib_id FROM lmldb.bib_index WHERE index_code = '655H' AND normal_heading = 'OBJECTS' ) AND expire_date > SYSDATE AND department.department_id = ? ORDER BY title_brief
